workDescription: Add ability to select multiple customer records and edit common fields in bulk. Sales team currently wastes hours editing customers one-by-one when updating territories, account managers, or tags. Need to save them time while maintaining data integrity.

context.userProblem: Sales managers need to reassign 50+ customers to new territories monthly. Currently takes 2-3 hours of repetitive clicking.
context.businessValue: Save 10+ hours per month per sales manager. Reduce errors from manual editing.
context.currentWorkaround: Export to CSV, edit in Excel, re-import. Clunky and error-prone.

inScope: Select multiple customers from list view
Edit common fields: territory, account manager, tags, status
Permission checks (can only edit customers you have access to)
Clear confirmation of what will change
rabbitHoles: Handling customers locked by other users
Real-time validation of all selected records
noGos: Don't rebuild the entire list view

expectedScopes: Bulk edit dialog with field selection
successCriteria: Sales manager can update 50 customers in under 2 minutes
Clear feedback on what will change before committing
No data corruption from partial failures
Works on both desktop and tablet
notes: This is a full-cycle example showing all Shape Up phases
Good example of appetite-driven scope setting
Shows how to handle common rabbit holes
